entry.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin-Qt/bitcoind version 0.8.1 available
entry.summary: The latest version of Bitcoin-Qt/bitcoind, version 0.8.1, is now available for download from SourceForge. This release is a maintenance update that includes a new network rule to prevent chain-forking incompatibility with versions 0.7.2 and earlier. The source code for this update is available in a 0.8.1 tree that was branched directly from the 0.8.0 release at GitHub. Gavin Andresen, the Chief Scientist at the Bitcoin Foundation, made the announcement. This update is important for those using Bitcoin-Qt/bitcoind as it prevents issues with chain-forking incompatibility. Users can download the update from SourceForge and access the source code from the 0.8.1 tree on GitHub. Gavin Andresen, the Chief Scientist at the Bitcoin Foundation, announced the release.
